summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B Review Date: 2020/08/07 Store: COSYMAY Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! This hair is gorgeous! Very nice thickness for a 20 inch and silky to the touch with so much body. The closure is perfect on this wig as well! Just to give you guys an idea of the body of this hair I uploaded videos but excuse me for still having my edges wrapped up lol Review Title: Silky and Quality Hair! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Ombre-Brown - 32inch 8Packs Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crochet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair (32 inch, T30) Review Date: 2020/08/08 Store: ToyoTree Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '16.5 x 7.2 x 2.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827816141'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:a3e393606a2e6dcef86b83ecc97fa694]] These are a very nice quality synthetic hair but they are small so I’d you’re going for a more fuller look I suggest getting more but if you’re going to space your crochets quite a bit or do individuals with these you should be okay. Very long too, but it’s great they give you a free gift of the crochet needle and jewels so no need for a store trip! Review Title: Nice Quality Twist But May Need More Packs! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman Review Date: 2020/08/09 Store: lorelo Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Review Text: Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Review Title: Perfect Heatless Curling tool! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Powder Vcedas 12 Colors Acrylic Powder Set for Nail UV Gel Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Review Date: 2020/09/12 Store: Vcedas Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Review Text: Nice vibrant colors! Very inclusive powder set with so many colors to choose from! Can’t wait to try this on my nails!! You must buy the acrylic liquid and brush applicator separate! Review Title: Colors are perfect! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Review Date: 2020/10/09 Store: Keiby Citom Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} Review Text: I used these to file at my acrylic nails in the application process and these did me wonders! Also I used this file it off when I’m removing my acrylic and it works perfect! Review Title: Perfect For Natural and Acrylic Nails! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Face and Body Paint Kit By Color Technik 24 Professional Oil Based Flash Colors, 2 Sets of 12 Color Palettes, 6 Paint Brushes 70 Stencils 2 Sponges Non-Toxic For Adults & Kids Halloween Painting Party Review Date: 2020/10/22 Store: Color Technik Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Color Technik', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 5 x 1 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CTFPS24'} Review Text: Nice pigment in the colors. Nice and bright. Got this for Halloween so it’s going to do justice with my costume and my kids costume! Review Title: Cant Wait Until Halloween. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl Review Date: 2020/11/08 Store: lootaan Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'} Review Text: Just what I expected from nails tips. These are the perfect quality and shape. Can’t wait to use these for my acrylic application! Review Title: Just What I Needed! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brazilian Straight Bundles Human Hair 3 Bundles 10A Straight Weave Hair Bundles 100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair Extensions Natural Black (22 24 26) Review Date: 2021/01/08 Store: ALIANNA Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ALIANNA', 'Color': 'black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 9.72 x 3.43 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c2e5a1ca1a75fceabb11204b06346775]] Honestly these are the longest bundles I’ve ever had lol as all wefted hair, longer hair lengths means thinner bundles and that’s kind of the case with these. Although they are on the thinner side they have a natural pattern that goes thickest from the wefted hair and thins out to the bottom giving you a more natural look when installed. The hair has plenty of movement and very soft to the touch. The luster is there as you can see when my light hits it. I’m also glad that the color isn’t super black and has natural black color with hints of brown. I know that it’s gonna but the below my back with these lengths so hopefully I don’t sit on it by mistake lol Review Title: Luster And Softness! It There! Cant Wait To Install! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Yayoge Poly Gel Nail Kit 4 Colors Builder Gel for Nails with Nail Art Tools Nail Extension Gel with Slip Solution All In One Kit for Nail Manicure Beginner Starter Kit DIY at Home Review Date: 2021/01/19 Store: yayoge Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {} Review Text: I love sets like these because it comes with everything you need to do your nails! Even the UV nail lamp! My little cousin loves seeing her older cousin do nails and I wanted her to start with something a little bit easier to work with that’s why I chose polygel because you can take as long as you need to work it around to your liking and no matter how messed up it may be you can file it into shape. It even gives nice gel color polishes to choose from and some pretty decors to add. She’s gonna love it! The polygel tubes are a bit small but are great for her starting off and with 7 colors she can choose what she wants to work with and have no problems! Review Title: Perfect for Beginners! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Play Tailor Kids Haircut Cape Barber Apron for Boys with Sponge Brush and Comb Accessories Set, Blue Tie Dye Spiral Review Date: 2021/03/14 Store: Green Hills Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {} Review Text: Perfect for cutting kids a hair at home
Not too uncomfortable on their neck.
Perfect size for as small as my 2 year old and works for my 6 year old as well.
Catches all the hair from getting on their clothes and becoming itchy!
Arm area is wide so they don’t feel restricted.
Also has a fun blue tie dye design with bright orange words! Review Title: Comfortable For Our 2 and 6 Year Old. No More Itch! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools Review Date: 2021/05/20 Store: LXIANGN Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {} Review Text: Aww they’re so cute! I love the chrome color of the dish and I still deep enough to get a good amount of monomer in it when doing nails. I only wish the top was chrome to like the rest of the dish but it’s clear and it doesn’t really go with it as a set. Review Title: I love these dishes but I do wish the set matched Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2Pcs French Smile Line Cutter,Nail Molding Stainless Steel Template Cutter French Nails Acrylic Pro 9 Size Tips French Smile Cut V Line Suitable For DIY Manicure,Manicure Edge Modification Review Date: 2021/05/23 Store: Aelflane Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 3.58 x 0.39 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '658141317541'} Review Text: It’s really hard to create free hand French tips nails and I’m a beginner at nails so I could use al the help I could get. This gives me a good clean slate for the white acrylic to be laid and I love it! I don’t know why I didn’t get one sooner! Review Title: Easier French tips with acrylic! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aiterina 16 Inch Lace Closure Wig Body Wave 4 By 4 Lace Front Wig Human Hair Body Wave Wig Pre Plucked With Baby Hair Free Part Brazilian Hair Wig Natural Color Review Date: 2021/05/25 Store: Aiterina Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Aiterina', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 6.54 x 2.13 inches; 10.97 Ounces'} Review Text: -inside the package I could feel the weight of the hair!
-it had a good thickness!
-true to length, no hanging pieces that contribute to the length.
-little to no shedding
-adjustable straps for the back of head to adjust to the size of your head
-lace bleach very well!
-very silky to the touch.
-I love lace closures wigs because they are much easier to glue down the lace and easier to work with as a beginner before working on the full frontal and messing up the hair completely. Review Title: Closures are perfect for easy lace styling Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 10 Colors Press On Nails, Teenitor Short Medium Length Matte Coffin Acrylic Ballerina Nails Solid Color Fake Nail Tips Set With Nail Glue, Nail Clipper And Nail File Review Date: 2021/07/27 Store: Teenitor Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Green,White,Purple', 'Size': '15 Piece Set', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'Teenitor', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 7.09 x 1.54 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: It’s so nice to know that o have press one for those days I don’t feel like doing my nails. And with them being short I can still function with my everyday tasks without it popping off or putting too much pressure on my fingers. They include glue but I prefer to use my own nail glue as it holds better but I like the overall look of the nails! They have this matte look and you have plenty of colors to choose from! My fav is the purple! Review Title: Easy to apply and enough to have multiple sets! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Morovan Monomer Acrylic Nail Liquid 8 Oz/240 ML-Professional Nail Flowers Liquid Monomer for acrylic nails Review Date: 2021/08/03 Store: Morovan Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 3.15 x 7.09 inches; 1.03 Pounds'} Review Text: I knew it was the real deal out of the packaging because the smell hit my nose. Most people look for one with no smell but I kind of like it lol I know that’s weird. But this particular brand works with all of my acrylic powder so I was happy to see a bigger bottle of this as I’ve run out. I don’t have yellowing issues but it does fill up a room quick so work in an open space or open windows. Review Title: I love this brand monomer! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B Review Date: 2020/08/07 Store: COSYMAY Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brazilian Straight Bundles Human Hair 3 Bundles 10A Straight Weave Hair Bundles 100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair Extensions Natural Black (22 24 26) Review Date: 2021/01/08 Store: ALIANNA Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ALIANNA', 'Color': 'black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 9.72 x 3.43 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c2e5a1ca1a75fceabb11204b06346775]] Honestly these are the longest bundles I’ve ever had lol as all wefted hair, longer hair lengths means thinner bundles and that’s kind of the case with these. Although they are on the thinner side they have a natural pattern that goes thickest from the wefted hair and thins out to the bottom giving you a more natural look when installed. The hair has plenty of movement and very soft to the touch. The luster is there as you can see when my light hits it. I’m also glad that the color isn’t super black and has natural black color with hints of brown. I know that it’s gonna but the below my back with these lengths so hopefully I don’t sit on it by mistake lol Review Title: Luster And Softness! It There! Cant Wait To Install! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Yayoge Poly Gel Nail Kit 4 Colors Builder Gel for Nails with Nail Art Tools Nail Extension Gel with Slip Solution All In One Kit for Nail Manicure Beginner Starter Kit DIY at Home Review Date: 2021/01/19 Store: yayoge Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {} Review Text: I love sets like these because it comes with everything you need to do your nails! Even the UV nail lamp! My little cousin loves seeing her older cousin do nails and I wanted her to start with something a little bit easier to work with that’s why I chose polygel because you can take as long as you need to work it around to your liking and no matter how messed up it may be you can file it into shape. It even gives nice gel color polishes to choose from and some pretty decors to add. She’s gonna love it! The polygel tubes are a bit small but are great for her starting off and with 7 colors she can choose what she wants to work with and have no problems! Review Title: Perfect for Beginners! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Play Tailor Kids Haircut Cape Barber Apron for Boys with Sponge Brush and Comb Accessories Set, Blue Tie Dye Spiral Review Date: 2021/03/14 Store: Green Hills Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {} Review Text: Perfect for cutting kids a hair at home
Not too uncomfortable on their neck.
Perfect size for as small as my 2 year old and works for my 6 year old as well.
Catches all the hair from getting on their clothes and becoming itchy!
Arm area is wide so they don’t feel restricted.
Also has a fun blue tie dye design with bright orange words! Review Title: Comfortable For Our 2 and 6 Year Old. No More Itch! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools Review Date: 2021/05/20 Store: LXIANGN Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {} Review Text: Aww they’re so cute! I love the chrome color of the dish and I still deep enough to get a good amount of monomer in it when doing nails. I only wish the top was chrome to like the rest of the dish but it’s clear and it doesn’t really go with it as a set. Review Title: I love these dishes but I do wish the set matched Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2Pcs French Smile Line Cutter,Nail Molding Stainless Steel Template Cutter French Nails Acrylic Pro 9 Size Tips French Smile Cut V Line Suitable For DIY Manicure,Manicure Edge Modification Review Date: 2021/05/23 Store: Aelflane Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 3.58 x 0.39 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '658141317541'} Review Text: It’s really hard to create free hand French tips nails and I’m a beginner at nails so I could use al the help I could get. This gives me a good clean slate for the white acrylic to be laid and I love it! I don’t know why I didn’t get one sooner! Review Title: Easier French tips with acrylic! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aiterina 16 Inch Lace Closure Wig Body Wave 4 By 4 Lace Front Wig Human Hair Body Wave Wig Pre Plucked With Baby Hair Free Part Brazilian Hair Wig Natural Color Review Date: 2021/05/25 Store: Aiterina Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Aiterina', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 6.54 x 2.13 inches; 10.97 Ounces'} Review Text: -inside the package I could feel the weight of the hair!
-it had a good thickness!
-true to length, no hanging pieces that contribute to the length.
-little to no shedding
-adjustable straps for the back of head to adjust to the size of your head
-lace bleach very well!
-very silky to the touch.
-I love lace closures wigs because they are much easier to glue down the lace and easier to work with as a beginner before working on the full frontal and messing up the hair completely. Review Title: Closures are perfect for easy lace styling Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 10 Colors Press On Nails, Teenitor Short Medium Length Matte Coffin Acrylic Ballerina Nails Solid Color Fake Nail Tips Set With Nail Glue, Nail Clipper And Nail File Review Date: 2021/07/27 Store: Teenitor Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Green,White,Purple', 'Size': '15 Piece Set', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'Teenitor', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 7.09 x 1.54 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: It’s so nice to know that o have press one for those days I don’t feel like doing my nails. And with them being short I can still function with my everyday tasks without it popping off or putting too much pressure on my fingers. They include glue but I prefer to use my own nail glue as it holds better but I like the overall look of the nails! They have this matte look and you have plenty of colors to choose from! My fav is the purple! Review Title: Easy to apply and enough to have multiple sets! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Morovan Monomer Acrylic Nail Liquid 8 Oz/240 ML-Professional Nail Flowers Liquid Monomer for acrylic nails Review Date: 2021/08/03 Store: Morovan Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 3.15 x 7.09 inches; 1.03 Pounds'} Review Text: I knew it was the real deal out of the packaging because the smell hit my nose. Most people look for one with no smell but I kind of like it lol I know that’s weird. But this particular brand works with all of my acrylic powder so I was happy to see a bigger bottle of this as I’ve run out. I don’t have yellowing issues but it does fill up a room quick so work in an open space or open windows. Review Title: I love this brand monomer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of this individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for beauty and personal care products, particularly focused on hair and nails. Consistently high ratings for products indicate a positive sentiment towards quality and effectiveness, especially in items like wigs and hair tools, highlighting a desire for natural-looking, easy-to-style hair. Common themes include a preference for synthetic and human hair accessories that are long, thick, and easy to manage.

Additionally, nail care products such as acrylic powders and press-on nails indicate a DIY approach to beauty with an appreciation for vibrant colors and ease of application. The individual shows an inclination towards products that enhance personal grooming and facilitate home beauty routines.

Price sensitivity appears varied; while some purchases reflect a moderate budget, there is a willingness to invest in quality items, particularly in hair products. This suggests a balance between value and performance is critical. Overall, the core preferences revolve around achieving high-quality beauty results with efficient application methods, showcasing a blend of practicality and aesthetic appeal in purchasing decisions.

target_interaction.title: The size could be bigger
target_interaction.text: The brush is a bit flimsy for my taste and much smaller than the usual size 12. The brush did appear to have a sort of glue product that was holding it together as well. It did do okay with applying acrylic though but it wouldn’t be my first choice.
target_interaction.title_meta: 100% Kolinsky Acrylic Nail Brush Size 12, Round Oval Crimped Shaped Sturdy Wooden Handle Acrylic Powder Nail Art Brush Professional Manicure Pedicure for DIY Home Salon
